dc:title: Day After Day - November 1933
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Contrasts society's concern for animals and sill "high society" games with the plight of those being evicted. Urges readers to petition against evictions.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 197 1933-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
